title: Add support for SKXamlCanvas on Uno Platform SkiaSharp backends v2.0 (#1634)
body:
**Description of Change**

Getting better builds for #1634

comments.author: jeromelaban
comments.body: @mattleibow  I've published a new build of Uno, 3.7.6 which will fix the invalid dependency you've seen. I've made the changes in a commit from your branch here: https://github.com/unoplatform/Uno.SkiaSharp/commit/c9563e5ae47a5c463197de3fa92aa58c13d2528c, if you want to cherry pick :)

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Awesome, starting the build again. Hopefully this is the one!

comments.author: jeromelaban
comments.body: Close, I guess ;) Let me know how I can help!

comments.author: jeromelaban
comments.body: You got lucky this time? Sweet 😁
